overview:
Taz Ngo is a proven leader, visionary and executive in global business expansion, wireless technologies, telecommunication infrastructures and software. Through his passion for technology and business, he has lead and motivated teams that have accomplished critical and sometime seemingly impossible goals. Taz brings a unique blend of technical understanding and business experience spanning across industry segments.

With over 20 years of experience, Taz has led global strategic business development activities and partnerships in the wireless, telecommunication, semiconductors and software industry for Fortune 500 and startups companies.
